q1: Why are Barcelona considered so good?
a1: They have a great history and arguably the best player in the world in Lionel Messi.
q2: When was the last time they have won the Champions League?
a3: There is a good possibility that they will. But it is still between the 3 top teams in Spain.
q5: Did Barcelona win la liga last season?
a5: Yes, they won last season. It was the 3rd win in the last 4 seasons.
